item.title: Random Typer (edit)
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Instead of making the termination part a procedure, you could just do it in the Until(). Like so.

Begin Wait(500); Repeat TypeRandom; Wait(10); hitenter; Wait(waittime); Until(IsKeyDown(Chr(32))); End.

Also, in stead of using case of for the random words, you could do something like this…

[code]
Procedure TypeRandom;
var
Chars: String;

begin
Chars:=‘abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz1234567890`~!@#$%^&*()-_=+[]{}|/?.,<>";:’’ ';
if random(Length(Chars)+1)=0 then
begin
SendKeys(Chr(13));
Exit;
end;
SendKeys(StrGet(Chars, Random(Length(Chars))+1));
end;[/code]
To shorten it up.

But either works fine, they both accomplish the same thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Random Typer (edit)
item.dc:creator: @m0ng00se m0ng00se
item.description:
@m0ng00se wrote:

Edit: Made a better version. Stops by hitting space bar, and hits enter after so many characters.

//Random ass typer by\\
//------M0ng00se-----\\
///////////////////////
//Hit SPACEBAR to stop\\
////////////////////////

program RandomTyper;
var
t : integer;
Const
waittime=0; // Time in between each typed letter. In milliseconds.
times=5; //How many characters to type before hitting enter(put 0 for never)

Procedure Termination;
begin
if(iskeydown(chr(32)))then
begin
TerminateScript;
end else
end;

Procedure TypeRandom;
begin
  Case Random(26) of
  0: sendkeys('a');
  1: sendkeys('b');
  2: sendkeys('c');
  3: sendkeys('d');
  4: sendkeys('e');
  5: sendkeys('f');
  6: sendkeys('g');
  7: sendkeys('h');
  8: sendkeys('i');
  9: sendkeys('j');
  10: sendkeys('k');
  11: sendkeys('l');
  12: sendkeys('m');
  13: sendkeys('n');
  14: sendkeys('o');
  15: sendkeys('p');
  16: sendkeys('q');
  17: sendkeys('r');
  18: sendkeys('s');
  19: sendkeys('t');
  20: sendkeys('u');
  21: sendkeys('v');
  22: sendkeys('w');
  23: sendkeys('x');
  24: sendkeys('y');
  25: sendkeys('z');
end;
t:=t+1;
Termination;
end;


Procedure Hitenter;
begin
Termination;
If(t >= times)then
begin
SendKeys(chr(13));
t:=0;
end else
end;

Begin
wait(500);
repeat
termination;
TypeRandom;
wait(10);
termination;
hitenter;
wait(waittime);
until(false)
End.

Read full topic

item.title: Random Typer (edit)
item.dc:creator: @aps aps
item.description:
@aps wrote:

:)ok I have 1 script that Isnt mine. So what it is is a random key typer, origginally by mongoose, but then i added about 30 to 40 more characters to it, so now its really random, and has spaces.

[scar]//Random ass typer by\
//--------APS--------\
//original script from Mongoose\

program RandomTyper;
Const
waittime=100; // Time in between each typed letter. In milliseconds.

Procedure TypeRandom;
begin
Case Random(58) of
0: sendkeyssilent(‘a’);
1: sendkeyssilent(‘b’);
2: sendkeyssilent(‘c’);
3: sendkeyssilent(‘d’);
4: sendkeyssilent(‘e’);
5: sendkeyssilent(‘f’);
6: sendkeyssilent(‘g’);
7: sendkeyssilent(‘h’);
8: sendkeyssilent(‘i’);
9: sendkeyssilent(‘j’);
10: sendkeyssilent(‘k’);
11: sendkeyssilent(‘l’);
12: sendkeyssilent(‘m’);
13: sendkeyssilent(‘n’);
14: sendkeyssilent(‘o’);
15: sendkeyssilent(‘p’);
16: sendkeyssilent(‘q’);
17: sendkeyssilent(‘r’);
18: sendkeyssilent(‘s’);
19: sendkeyssilent(‘t’);
20: sendkeyssilent(‘u’);
21: sendkeyssilent(‘v’);
22: sendkeyssilent(‘w’);
23: sendkeyssilent(‘x’);
24: sendkeyssilent(‘y’);
25: sendkeyssilent(‘z’);
26: sendkeyssilent(‘1’);
27: sendkeyssilent(‘2’);
28: sendkeyssilent(‘3’);
29: sendkeyssilent(‘4’);
30: sendkeyssilent(‘5’);
31: sendkeyssilent(‘6’);
32: sendkeyssilent(‘7’);
33: sendkeyssilent(‘8’);
34: sendkeyssilent(‘9’);
35: sendkeyssilent(’ ‘);
36: sendkeyssilent(’!’);
37: sendkeyssilent(’@’);
38: sendkeyssilent(’#’);
39: sendkeyssilent(’$’);
40: sendkeyssilent(’%’);
41: sendkeyssilent(‘Ä’);
42: sendkeyssilent(’&’);
43: sendkeyssilent(’*’);
44: sendkeyssilent(’(’);
45: sendkeyssilent(’)’);
46: sendkeyssilent(’_’);
47: sendkeyssilent(’-’);
48: sendkeyssilent(’=’);
49: sendkeyssilent(’+’);
50: sendkeyssilent(’;’);
51: sendkeyssilent(’?’);
52: sendkeyssilent(’.’);
53: sendkeyssilent(’,’);
54: sendkeyssilent(’/’);
55: sendkeyssilent(’’);
56: sendkeyssilent(’~’);
57: sendkeyssilent(Chr(13))
58: sendkeysvb(’{ENTER}’,true);
end;
end;

Begin
repeat
TypeRandom;
wait(waittime);
until(false)
End.[/scar]
